channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Bad Bunny to Live Stream Surprise Final Show of Puerto Rico Residency on Amazon Music
item.description: 🎉 Join the party! Bad Bunny is bringing the heat with a surprise live stream on Amazon Music! 🔥🇵🇷 #BadBunny #LiveStreamFun

item.title: Dua Lipa Covers OutKast’s “Hey Ya!” and TLC’s “No Scrubs” in Atlanta: Watch
item.description: 💃 Dua Lipa bringing major 2000s vibes with OutKast and TLC covers! Check it out for a serious dose of nostalgia! 🎶✨

item.title: Mariah Carey Announces Las Vegas Holiday Residency: How to Get Tickets
item.description: 🎉 Celebrate the holidays with the queen of Christmas! Mariah Carey is bringing festive cheer to Vegas, who's ready to sing along? 🎄🎤 #MariahCarey #HolidayResidency

item.title: Foo Fighters played deep cuts at first show with new drummer Ilan Rubin (pics, video, setlist)
item.description: Rocking out with Foo Fighters' deep cuts at their first show with new drummer Ilan Rubin! 🎸🤘 Check out the epic pics, videos, and setlist!

item.title: Massive Attack Announce Brazil Concert Supporting Indigenous Rights and Climate Justice
item.description: Grooving for good vibes! 🎶 Massive Attack bringing the beats to Brazil for a powerful cause. Let's dance with purpose! 💃🌎 #MusicWithAMission #MassiveAttackBrazil
